ags:resource.dc:title: Eight years of research on bluefin tuna (Thunnus thynnus) culture at the Spanish Institute of Oceanography (IEO)
ags:resource.dc:subject: Thunnus thynnus
atún rojo
Bluefin tuna
aquaculture
acuicultura
investigación
research
ags:resource.dc:description: Since 2000 the Spanish Institute of Oceanography (IEO) is participating in several research projects on BFT culture with the aim of contributing of the Domestication of this species, for improving the productive process and reducing the pressure on the wild stock as it has already happened with other full cycle cultured species.
ags:resource.dc:identifier: De la Gándara, F. and A. Ortega, 2008. Eight years of research on bluefin tuna (Thunnus thynnus) culture at the Spanish Institute of Oceanography (IEO). In: Proceedings of the EAS 2008 Krakow (Poland): 185:186
